description: 3.13 (L1) Ensure 'Enable Safe Browsing for trusted sources' is set to 'Disabled'
info:
"Google Chrome can be adjusted to allow downloads without Safe Browsing checks when the requested file is from a trusted source. Trusted sources can be defined using recommendation 'Configure the list of domains on which Safe Browsing will not trigger warnings'.

The recommended state for this setting is: Disabled (0)
NOTE:
On Microsoft(R) Windows(R), this functionality is only available on instances that are joined to a Microsoft(R) Active Directory(R) domain, running on Windows 10 Pro, or enrolled in Chrome Browser Cloud Management.

Information requested from trusted sources shall not be sent to Google's safe browsing servers."
solution:
"To establish the recommended configuration via Group Policy, set the following UI path to Disabled :

Computer Configuration\Administrative Templates\Google\Google Chrome\Enable Safe Browsing for trusted sources
Impact: If this setting is disabled, files downloaded from intranet resources will not be checked by Google Services."
